import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Header from'../components/Header';import Hero from'../components/Hero';import ValueProposition from'../components/ValueProposition';import HRPlatform from'../components/HRPlatform';import Ecosystem from'../components/Ecosystem';import Proof from'../components/Proof';import Contact from'../components/Contact';import Footer from'../components/Footer';import ScrollToTop from'../components/ScrollToTop';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{useEffect(()=>{// Initialize animations for elements with data-animate attribute
